name: Galloping Horses
description:
Changes to horse movement, specifically inspired by Battlefield 1 horse mechanics.
Horses have 3 running state, plotting, trotting, and galloping, with each state having its own max and min speed.
They move in the direction of the rider's look angle modified by the rider's keyboard input (pressing S moves the horse backwards from your look angle).
Go up states by pressing the sprint button, down states by letting go of all movement keys and letting the horse slow down.
More to come.
